memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int n, const float *A, rocblas_int lda, rocblas_int bsa, float *invA, rocblas_int ldinvA, rocblas_int bsinvA, rocblas_int batch_count)
memberdef.name: rocblas_strtri_batched

detaileddescription.para: trtri compute the inverse of a matrix A inv(A);

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
rocblas_fill. specifies whether the upper 'rocblas_fill_upper' or lower 'rocblas_fill_lower'
rocblas_diagonal. = 'rocblas_diagonal_non_unit', A is non-unit triangular; = 'rocblas_diagonal_unit', A is unit triangular;
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of A.
rocblas_int "batch stride a": stride from the start of one "A" matrix to the next

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int n, const double *A, rocblas_int lda, rocblas_int bsa, double *invA, rocblas_int ldinvA, rocblas_int bsinvA, rocblas_int batch_count)
memberdef.name: rocblas_dtrtri_batched
